metadata.name: Local File Read Using Curl.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "file://" protocol handler in order to read local files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\curl.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('curl.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('file:///')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "file://" protocol handler in order to read local files.
